titleStmt.title: An entry from the Journals of Hensley Henson

sourceDesc.bibl: Edited from the manuscripts in the custody of Durham Cathedral Library.

p.hi: I returned to Hereford in great discomfort, &, on
reaching the Palace, sent for D
Paterson, who sent me forthwith to bed
There I had to set to re–arranging engagement.
was telegraphed to, and asked to undertake the Confirmations at Ross, & in Shropshire, which were fixed for tomorrow & Wednesday.
